document.full_text: staples inc  slashed its full-year forecast and said it would open fewer stores than it had planned after its quarterly results missed wall street estimates, sending its shares down nearly 16 percent.
document.title: staples disappoints; some want office chains to merge
lines_and_colors: staples inc  slashed its full-year forecast and said it would open fewer stores than it had planned after its quarterly results missed wall street estimates, sending its shares down nearly 16 percent.
